message:
SYSTEM: OntoDDB.pdf: Página 8
12/11/2009
OWL STORAGE
• Requirements
– Wide scope, not limited to any project
– Conceptual representation, not attached to any format
– Portable between different DBMS
– Efficiency retrieving concepts
• No good models proposed
– Very simple
– Not efficient
• Solution
– Design a new storage model taking advantage of relational 
capabilities
• Make explicit all OWL components defined in the OWL 
specification: classes, properties, literals, etc.
speaker: SYSTEM
